docs.title: Brief
docs.text: This is the personal site of Herohui, a embedded developer and technology enthusiast. Here you can find information about Herohui's projects, blog posts, and soon.

docs.title: Happy new years' eve!
docs.text:
We hope you are all having fun and wish you all the best for the new year!
